articles.title: Chris Bowen releases safeguard mechanism rules for big polluters, carbon price capped at $75 and will rise with inflation - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: The Albanese government will cap the carbon price at $75 a tonne for miners and other big industrial emitters, in a bid to shield business from the risk of future cost spikes and provide certainty under Labor’s decarbonisation plan.
